message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a great product that I think you'll be interested in. I'm offering it to you for $150. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but $150 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $120.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $120 is just a bit too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $135.  This is a fair price for both of us. What do you say?
I appreciate your willingness to come down to $135, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $125. Can you meet me in the middle?
